headline: What FirstEnergy (FE)'s Proposed Pennsylvania Default Service Plan Means For Shareholders
summary: In early 2026, FirstEnergy’s Pennsylvania utilities filed a new Default Service Plan proposing revised electricity procurement, added consumer protections, and shorter Time‑of‑Use peak hours starting in 2027, subject to regulatory approval. This filing is significant because it could reshape how default customers interact with competitive suppliers, potentially tightening guardrails around contract expirations and price clarity. Next, we’ll consider how this proposed Pennsylvania Default...
